hadiths.text: Ibn Abbas narrated:"The Messenger of Allah prostrated for it - meaning (in Surat) An-Najm - and so did the Muslims, the idolaters, the Jinns, and the people

chapter.ara-name: باب مَا جَاءَ فِي السَّجْدَةِ فِي النَّجْمِ
chapter.eng-name: What Has Been Related About Prostration In (Surat) An-Najm
